hero_title: The AI workspace that ships content for you
hero_subtitle: Delegate and automate your content creation and advertising using AI and powerful automation tools. Save time and scale your business effortlessly.
features_1_desc: Generate high-quality blog posts, social media content, and marketing copy with cutting-edge AI models.
features_2_desc: Set up workflows that automatically create and distribute content across all your channels.
features_3_desc: Create, optimize, and monitor your advertising campaigns across multiple platforms from a single dashboard.
features_4_desc: Track performance metrics and get actionable insights to optimize your content strategy.
cta_title: Ready to Transform Your Content Creation?
cta_subtitle: Join our waitlist to be notified when we launch and get exclusive early access benefits.
cta_success: Thank you! You've been added to our waitlist.
cta_disclaimer: No spam, only launch updates. You can unsubscribe at any time.
footer_desc: AI-powered content creation and automation for small businesses and entrepreneurs. Save time and scale your reach.
supported_platforms_desc: Our AI tools generate tailored content for all major social media platforms, blogs, and more.
supported_platforms_footer: Easily create, schedule, and publish content to all your favorite platforms with our unified dashboard. No more switching between multiple tools!

roadmap_define_goals_desc: Specify your content goals, target audience, and brand voice
roadmap_generate_content_desc: Our AI creates tailored content based on your specifications
roadmap_review_refine_desc: Review AI suggestions and make any necessary adjustments
roadmap_schedule_publish_desc: Schedule content across multiple platforms with one click
roadmap_subtitle: Our streamlined process ensures quality content creation from start to finish
howitworks_subtitle: Get started in minutes with our simple three-step process
howitworks_step1_desc: Set up your content needs, target audience, and brand guidelines in our simple setup wizard.
howitworks_step2_desc: Choose from pre-built templates or customize your own for different content types and channels.
howitworks_step3_desc: Schedule content generation and publication across your marketing channels with a few clicks.
